analysis: The current project has a basic HTML structure with minimal CSS styling and incomplete JavaScript functionality. The theme should be updated to reflect a black hole and cosmic theme with animated objects and slides. The CSS needs to include dark cosmic colors, black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The HTML should have sections for interactive planets and animated slides related to black holes.

improvements.description: Update CSS to include dark cosmic theme with black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Complete HTML content to include sections for interactive planets, animated slides, and other black hole-related content.
Enhance JavaScript to add functionality for animated objects and slides related to black holes.
